title: BLUE (ISOLATED VOCALS)
lyrics:
[Part I]
[Intro]
Mm, mm, mm
[Chorus]
I try to live in black and white, but I'm so blue
I'd like to mean it when I say I'm over you
But that's still not true (Ooh)
Ooh, And I'm still so blue, ah-oh
[Verse]
I thought we were the same (Thought we were the same)
Birds of a feather (Birds of a), now I'm ashamed (Feather)
I told you a lie, désolée, mon amour
I'm tryin' my best (I'm trying), don't know what's in store (My best)
Open up the door (Ooh)
In the back of my mind, I'm still overseas
A bird in a cage, thought you were made for me
[Chorus]
I try (I'm not what) to live in black and white, but I'm so blue (But I'm not what you need)
I'd likе (Not what you need) to mean it when I say I'm over you (I'm ovеr)
But that's still not true (Ooh, I'm over you), true
And I'm still so blue (And it's not true)
True blue, true blue
I'm true blue

[Outro]
(Ooh) Mm, mm, mm
[Part II]
[Intro]
Mm-ah
Ah-ah (Ah)
Ah-ah
[Verse 1]
You were born bluer than a butterfly
Beautiful and so deprived of oxygen
Colder than your father's eyes
He never learned to sympathize with anyone (Ah)
[Chorus]
I don't blame you (Mm)
But I can't change you (Mm)
Don't hate you (Don't hate you)
But we can't save you (But we can't save you)
[Verse 2]
You were born reachin' for your mother's hands
Victim of your father's plans to rule the world
Too afraid to step outside
Paranoid and petrified of what you've heard

[Bridge]
But they could say the same 'bout me
I sleep 'bout three hours each night
Means only twenty-one a week now, now, mm
And I could say the same 'bout you (I don't blame you)
Born blameless, grew up famous too (I don't blame you)
Just a baby born blue now, now (Mm)
[Chorus]
I don't blame you (I don't blame you)
But I can't change you (Three hours each night, means only-)
Don't hate you (Don't hate you)
But we can't save you (But we can't save you)
(Just a baby born blue)
[Bridge]
(Same 'bout me) Ah-ah
(I sleep 'bout three hours each night) Ah-ah
(Means only twenty-one a week now)
(Same 'bout me) Ah-ah
(I sleep 'bout three hours each night)
(Means only twenty-one a week now)
(Same 'bout me) Ah-ah
(I sleep 'bout three hours each night)
(Means only twenty-one a week now) Ah
(Same 'bout me)
(I sleep 'bout three hours each night)
(Means only twenty-one a week now)
Ooh-ooh
It's over now
It's over now
It's over now (Mm-mm)
(Ah-ah-ah, ah)

[Outro]
But when can I hear the next one?
